actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $1 million to $10 million the exemption from industrial development bond treatment for certain small issues.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $1,000,000 to $10,000,000 the maximum size of small issues of industrial development bonds on which the interest qualifies for a tax exclusion.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $1 million to $10 million the exemption from industrial development bond treatment for certain small issues.
